summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Engineering Department; amending Section 1 of Ordinance 107527, making a change in the percentage of construction costs to be paid by Burlington Northern, Inc., a Delaware Corporation, and Oregon-Washington Railroad and Navigation Company, an Oregon Corporation, and its lessee, the Union Pacific Railroad Company, a Utah Corporation for the Repair, Renewal and Reconstruction of the Airport Way S. Viaduct over Argo Railroad Yards.
